summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for scaffold-eth/create-eth in July 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Introduced custom root scripts for Solidity frameworks with PR #326.
  - Added the capability to display the create-eth version on the initial commit with PR #314.
  - Enhanced the extension list to improve user experience with PR #321.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved an issue where create-eth did not exit with error code 1 on failure (PR #319).
  - Fixed verification issues in the VerifyAll contract (PR #312).
  - Addressed component tree remounting issues when switching themes (PR #302).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving user experience and functionality through enhancements and bug fixes.
  - Active development with 22 pull requests, of which 17 were merged, indicating a productive month.

topIssues.title: create-eth doesn't exit with process code 1 when an error occurs
Add create-eth version on Initial commit
[Beta] After switching theme full components tree remounts
[Feature] - Provide some way to change package.json scripts based on selected contract framework

topPRs.title: Custom root scripts for solidity frameworks
extension list: numbered challenges => not numbered challenges
ci: remove skip version package logic
